Html:
I want to work with audio of video file but I don't know how I do.

I see NAudio only work with Mp3 file and Wav file.

Please help me !
You can use the MediaFoundationReader (currently in 1.7 preview release only) to do this

markheath wrote:
You can use the MediaFoundationReader (currently in 1.7 preview release only) to do this
Where can I download NAudio 1.7 ?

I don't see it on this web.
Download the source code and build it yourself. Or if you use NuGet, you can get a pre-release build from nuget.

I don't see where the source code of MediaFoundationReader or 1.7.

I was so upset about this. I tried to understand NAudio all day.

Please help me !
look above at the "Source Code" tab

I can not open your solution in source code. Because it is in newer version. My version Visual is 2010.

What version of Visual did you use to do it ?

I use VS2012 but only because there is now a Windows 8 store app in the solution. You can make your own VS2010 solution and add all the csproj except the Windows 8 store app one and it should work just fine.
